    value: true

```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  results='asis', 
  echo = FALSE
)

library(magrittr) # For the pipe
library(tidyverse)
library(glue)
source("cv_printing_functions.r")

# Read in all data and initialize a CV printer object
CV <- create_CV_object(
  data_location = "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JQKG-996mzKL1WyVU2Djd1lNCELkMSuvXJpo-40Y5Qo/edit?usp=sharing",  
  pdf_mode = params$pdf_mode
) 

# modify CV entries to contain only those that are for resume
entries_data <- CV %>% 
  purrr::pluck("entries_data") %>% 
  filter(in_resume == TRUE) %>% 
  mutate(
    # Build some custom sections by collapsing others
    section = case_when(
      section %in% c('research_positions', 'industry_positions', 'teaching_positions') ~ 'positions', 
      section %in% c('academic_articles') ~ 'writings',
      TRUE ~ section
    )
  ) 

# edit the data frame `entries_data` in the list
CV <- CV %>% 
  purrr::assign_in("entries_data", entries_data)
```

```{r}
# When in pdf export mode the little dots are unaligned, so fix that with some conditional CSS.
if(params$pdf_mode) {
    cat("
<style>
:root{
  --decorator-outer-offset-left: -6.5px;
}
</style>")
}
```
